channel.title: Morphing!
channel.description: Does any 1 no the code for morphing??? :confused:

item.title: Morphing!
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

Try this it works on my testscape based server

[code]if (command.startsWith("unmorph"))
                {
                String otherPName = command.substring(8);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.isNpc = false;
                    p.updateRequired = true;
                    p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    p.sendMessage("You start to feel normal");
                    p.stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
            }
}
if (command.startsWith("morph")) {
                try {
                    int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6,10));
                    String otherPName = command.substring(11);
                    int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
                    if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0);
                    if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                        client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                        p.npcId = newNPC;
                        p.isNpc = true;
                        p.updateRequired = true;
                        p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                        p.sendMessage("A magic spell changed you!");
                        p.stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
                    } else {
                        sendMessage("That name doesn't exist.");
                    }
                } catch(Exception e) {
                    sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::morph #### playerName");
                }
            }[/code]

Ya, use code tags.
&& you would use it as:

::morph ####

Read full topic

Use as ::pnpc #"); } }that is my code for pnpc but it wont change ur appearance[/quote]
